setting.location: High tower or church bell tower overlooking Warsaw, storm clouds building dramatically
setting.weather: Massive thunderstorm approaching with dark clouds and lightning in distance

characters.appearance: Middle-aged man, 40s, standing at height overlooking city, wind whipping coat and hair
characters.clothing: Dark overcoat billowing in wind, hat blown off and forgotten, white shirt visible beneath coat
characters.position: Standing at edge of high viewpoint, gripping stone railing or wall
characters.action: Staring out over city as storm approaches, expression matching tempestuous weather

scene.mainElements: Panoramic view of Warsaw spread below, dramatic storm clouds building on horizon, lightning flickering in dark sky, city buildings looking small and vulnerable from great height
scene.details: Thunder rumbling in distance, first drops of rain beginning to fall, wind strong enough to bend trees and rattle windows below, church bells ringing storm warning, people in streets below hurrying for shelter, dramatic contrast between dark storm clouds and remaining patches of sunlight, birds fleeing before advancing weather
scene.background: Vistula River winding through city, bridges and major buildings identifiable below, countryside visible in distance where storm is approaching
scene.atmosphere: Brewing emotional and meteorological tempest, sense of forces beyond human control gathering strength, man positioning himself against storm like romantic hero facing destiny, correlation between inner turmoil and external natural drama, no text or letters visible

composition.cameraAngle: Dramatic shot showing figure silhouetted against storm sky
composition.focus: Man confronting approaching storm both literal and metaphorical
composition.depth: Foreground: figure on high platform, middle: city spread below, background: advancing storm clouds and lightning
